attributes.additional_details: Grooming gangs target girls 14 or over, because they know police will just give them slap on wrist. Hardly any go to court and when they do, police & courts say girls aint reliable enough ( well they would not be they been brain washed ). So these men walk free from court and carry on  doing it to more and more young girls.i want the law changed, like they have done for domestic violence why can't they do this for young girls!  Police to take it out these young girls hands and take these grooming gangs to court there self's.  Please sign because we need to protect young girls this is going on in every town and it needs to be stopped!
